item.title: mac os x getting mysql and rails to work
item.description: So I couldn't resist and bought myself a MacBook Pro! It's my first week with my new toy and I'm really enjoying it. But I need to do something useful with it so I started to prepare it to be my new development platform, starting with Ruby/Rails + MySQL: Here is where the fun begins! After I installed both Rails and MySQL, I fired up a terminal an typed:
